    AbstractCounter
    Abstract base class for defining counters.
    AbstractMeasure
    Base class for defining measures stored for any counter.
    AbstractState<T>

    Class containing information about the running application.

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigurationException
    Exception type to be used for escalating configuration errors.
    DataNotFoundException
    Common getError definition for entity query errors.
    LockTimeoutException  
    Monitor.MonitorException
    Exception class used to relay errors encountered by the application monitor.
    OperationTimeoutException
    Exception type to be used for escalating operation timeouts.
    StateException
    Exception type to be used to escalate Object/Process setState exceptions.
    Task.TaskException
    Exception type to be escalated by managed task.
    TimeWindowException
    Exception type escalated for Time window related errors.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ServiceSpec
    Path definition annotation for a service, analogous to REST service locator path.
